headline: Ralph Lauren (RL) Valuation Check After Analyst Upgrades And Strong Q3 FY2026 Results
summary: Ralph Lauren (RL) has come back into focus after analysts upgraded the stock, including a move to Zacks Rank #1, following its Q3 FY2026 results, which reflected margin expansion and solid revenue growth. See our latest analysis for Ralph Lauren. The recent analyst upgrades and Q3 FY2026 earnings have come alongside a 1-year total shareholder return of 41.28%, while the current share price of $374.13 reflects more moderate short term share price momentum, suggesting earlier optimism has...

headline: Interparfums Q4 Earnings Top Estimates, Organic Sales Increase 3%
summary: IPAR's Q4 earnings beat estimates as sales rise 7% and organic growth hits 3%, driven by top brands and Travel Retail strength despite tariff pressures.

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.
